rows.label: bf01140100_0010
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hm?

rows.label: bf01140100_0020
rows.name:
That's the black ship from the harbor.
Is it...following us...?

rows.label: bf01140100_0030
rows.name: Man, it's pretty cold.

rows.label: bf01140100_0040
rows.name: You-

rows.label: bf01140100_0050
rows.name: Not 'you' - I have a name, it's Nia

rows.label: bf01140100_0060
rows.name:
They've started drinking downstairs
Keep me company a bit.

rows.label: bf01140100_0070
rows.name: Do you dislike alcohol, Nia?

rows.label: bf01140100_0080
rows.name: I don't hate it, just don't like drunks.

rows.label: bf01140100_0090
rows.name: Huh. Can't become a salvager, then.

rows.label: bf01140100_0100
rows.name: Why's that?

rows.label: bf01140100_0110
rows.name:
Swim like a fish, and drink like one too.
That's the Salvager's Code.

rows.label: bf01140100_0120
rows.name:
How stupid
I don't feel like changing careers at all.

rows.label: bf01140100_0130
rows.name: Well, yeah, makes sense.

rows.label: bf01140100_0140
rows.name:
Drivers probably earn a lot 
more than salvagers, right?

rows.label: bf01140100_0150
rows.name: You are...

rows.label: bf01140100_0160
rows.name: Rex is fine.

rows.label: bf01140100_0170
rows.name:
So Rex
Why did you become a salvager?

rows.label: bf01140100_0180
rows.name: Over there.

rows.label: bf01140100_0190
rows.name: The...Wrold Tree? What about it?

rows.label: bf01140100_0200
rows.name:
When you're a salvager
You find all sorts of things.

rows.label: bf01140100_0210
rows.name:
Things people dropped or left behind.
All of things that 'died' once.

rows.label: bf01140100_0220
rows.name:
Haven't you noticed how the number of 
Divine Beasts has really decreased lately?

rows.label: bf01140100_0230
rows.name:
Just the other day I saw
a large Divine Beast sink

rows.label: bf01140100_0240
rows.name: With all its animals still on it.

rows.label: bf01140100_0250
rows.name: Living space is running out day by day.

rows.label: bf01140100_0260
rows.name:
Eventually we too will become 
'things that died once.'

rows.label: bf01140100_0270
rows.name: But there's Eden up there.

rows.label: bf01140100_0280
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Pff... Bwahahahaha!

rows.label: bf01140100_0290
rows.name:
You seriously believe that?
The Eden legend?

rows.label: bf01140100_0300
rows.name:
No way something like that exists.
That's just a huge tree.

rows.label: bf01140100_0310
rows.name: So that's why you're a salvager?

rows.label: bf01140100_0320
rows.name:
If there is a way to get up there,
maybe it's hidden below the clouds.

rows.label: bf01140100_0330
rows.name: Nothing wrong with that.

rows.label: bf01140100_0340
rows.name: But you know?

rows.label: bf01140100_0350
rows.name:
We wouldn't need to fight over the few 
remaining Divine Beasts and resources.

rows.label: bf01140100_0360
rows.name: We wouldn't need to live in fear of the land sinking.

rows.label: bf01140100_0370
rows.name: A place where everyone can live without worry.

rows.label: bf01140100_0380
rows.name:
Is it wrong to dream
that such a place exists?

rows.label: bf01140100_0390
rows.name: You can dream all you want, but...

rows.label: bf01140100_0400
rows.name: Hmm..."Everyone," huh...?

rows.label: bf01140100_0410
rows.name: What?

rows.label: bf01140100_0420
rows.name:
I thought humans were more
selfish creatures than that

rows.label: bf01140100_0430
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf01140100_0440
rows.name: Do you have parents?

rows.label: bf01140100_0450
rows.name: Nope.

rows.label: bf01140100_0460
rows.name:
I heard from Gramps and others
that they died when I was small.

rows.label: bf01140100_0470
rows.name:
"Gramps"... you mean, the same
who taught you to use Arts?

rows.label: bf01140100_0480
rows.name: Yeah, he basically raised me himself.

rows.label: bf01140100_0490
rows.name: He's not human, though.

rows.label: bf01140100_0500
rows.name: Not human?

rows.label: bf01140100_0510
rows.name:
Don't really get what you're talking about but hey,
be thankful to this Gramps of yours.

rows.label: bf01140100_0520
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf01140100_0530
rows.name: And you're not all bad too.

rows.label: bf01140100_0540
rows.name: You're just like me.

rows.label: bf01140100_0550
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh...?
